name: Targi: Die Bonus-Box
description: To coincide with the tenth anniversary of Targi, designer Andreas Steiger and publisher KOSMOS are releasing Targi: Die Bonus-Box, which contains wooden tokens to replace the goods tiles in the base game, two modules of six new edge cards, new action cards, and rules for a solo mode. The material in this expansion can also be combined with Targi: The Expansion.
